As a young boy growing up i remember playing this game at the time before we got the world wide web into our homes, i remember enjoying it really much even though i only made it past the first "boss" tentacle thing before my brothers saved over my files. Now as a grown man coming back to this game and completing it having gathered plenty experience from different other newer Valve games i must say that this game was today as enjoyable as it was back then after getting accustomed to the old type of gunplay again (which was fairly easy) and the plot of this game was able to pull in my attention and keep me entertained for hours. Clocking in at 8.9 hours at my first ever completion time all i can really say is that it's really worth giving this game a go :)
Yes

«Goldsource» - is the engine on which «Half-Life» is based. It creates a dark and mysterious atmosphere that sets its own unique style and aesthetics.

«SFX» (Sound Environment) - is a great addition to this engine. The minimalistic sound in «Lo-Fi» format, of course, created a lot of memes, but this sound fits the game perfectly.

These simple forms put the imagination to work. Unique game.

Im not a profesional critic, but...what the heck, Half life is a "oustanding massive old school game you must play" where you play as Gordon Freeman, a neerd scientist who just begin another boring work day in Black Mesa, a top secret US laboratory in New Mexico, to do another boring top secret programed test on a unknown extraterrestrial sample just called GG-3883 or "purest sample" for short, so what can be wrong? From there and on you must fight your way armed mainly with a crowbar to reveal the unforseen consecuences from th experiment.

Aunque Half Life es un juego antiguo, hay que admitir que es una evolución de la industria de los videojuegos. Gracias a este juego, salieron juegazos. En el caso de la jugabilidad, es muy bueno, aunque encuentras algunos bugs es jugable. A parte la historia es muy interesante cuando interactuas con los personajes hasta matar a los enemigos. Por eso les recomiendo a todos que jueguen.

Half Life is (in my opinion) one of the top 5 most important FPS ever. If Wolfenstein and Doom started the genre, Quake started to use real 3d and Call of Duty is the peak of multiplayer FPS, Half Life is the first FPS to create a deep lore and story. For a 1998 game, Valve made it solid enough to be enjoyable for years and decades.

Story is really good developed and well designed, enough to create one of the most beautiful lores in the videogame industry. Basically you play as Gordon Freeman, a scientist who, because an incident, has to escape from Black Mesa facility while fighting aliens to stop the invasion. 

Gameplay is really well made even for a game made 24 years ago. The HUD looks clean, with the weapon selection well chosen and good mechanics: refilling the HEV suit's shield, using a lantern (this was one of the things I didn't liked, but it's forgivable since it's one of the FPS pioneers and neither Wolfenstein/Doom, Quake or Duke Nukem had tried to include it), and the puzzles might be hard sometimes, but it's the fun of the game, I guess.

Graphics are not horrible. It might look really outdated even using the HD models, but I don't blame Valve. GoldSource was the peak of game engines in the 90's, but nowadays it might look clunky.

Story is really good (SPOILER ALERT). Gordon Freeman starts his job in Black Mesa facility trying to make a spectrometer, but it goes wrong and aliens invade the facility. Later, the US Army arrives and the scientists have hope that the soldiers will control the invasion, but the true reason the marines are there is to kill everyone in Black Mesa. Finally, Gordon finds a way to stop the aliens using a portal to Xen. Discretly, a suspicious man is watching Gordon around Black Mesa.

The game itself it's long for 8 to 10 hours long, although sometimes it can be much difficult because puzzles or moments when you have to think too much every action. 

If you love FPS, play Half Life. If you love videogames, play Half Life. If you want to play a good story, play Half Life. Definitely this game is a must-play if you are a gamer.

Gerçekten dönemin en iyi oyunu... ancak bu dönemde oynanır mı? Bence oynanır zaten fiyatı da makul bir seviyede (indirimdeyken). Black Mesa adlı bir oyun çıktı ve bu oyunun remastered hali. Eğer 20 TL'niz varsa (indirimdeyken) ve grafikleri iyi olursa oynarım diyorsanız Black Mesa alınabilir. Grafikleri takmıyorsanız, sadece hikaye bana yeter diyorsanız bu oyunu alabilirsiniz.
